nodes.html:
<button id="footer_menu1" aria-controls="footerMenu1" aria-expanded="false" class="flex items-center justify-between w-100 bg-transparent accordion-button db white lh-copy pv1-l pv2 ph3 ph0-l brand-semibold f6 tl" neptune-engage="{
                        on:click,
                        targets: [
                          {
                            selector: "_self",
                            "classes": {
                              "toggle":"active"
                            },
                            "attributes": [
                              {
                                "att": "aria-expanded",
                                "toggle":["true", "false"]
                              }
                            ]
                          },
                          {
                            selector: "#footerMenu1",
                            "classes":{
                              "toggle":"active"
                            },
                            "attributes": [
                            {
                              "att": "aria-hidden",
                              "toggle":["true", "false"]
                            }]
                          }
                        ]
                      }">

        on:click,
